mapper.select: SELECT 1 AS proj_area, r.* FROM (SELECT p.proj_no,p.proj_category, p.proj_title, p.proj_goals, proj_start, proj_end, NVL2(b.book_no,1,0) AS bm FROM kk_project p LEFT OUTER JOIN kk_bookmark b ON (p.proj_no=b.book_proj AND b.book_id=#{id}) WHERE p.proj_status=1 AND SYSDATE < p.proj_end ORDER BY p.proj_bmcnt DESC ) r WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8 UNION SELECT 2 AS c, r.* FROM (SELECT p.proj_no,p.proj_category, p.proj_title, p.proj_goals, proj_start, proj_end, NVL2(b.book_no,1,0) AS bm FROM kk_project p LEFT OUTER JOIN kk_bookmark b ON (p.proj_no=b.book_proj AND b.book_id=#{id}) WHERE p.proj_status=1 AND p.proj_start < SYSDATE ORDER BY p.proj_start DESC ) r WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8 UNION SELECT 3 AS c, r.* FROM (SELECT p.proj_no,p.proj_category, p.proj_title, p.proj_goals, proj_start, proj_end, NVL2(b.book_no,1,0) AS bm FROM kk_project p LEFT OUTER JOIN kk_bookmark b ON (p.proj_no=b.book_proj AND b.book_id=#{id}) WHERE p.proj_status=1 AND SYSDATE < p.proj_start ORDER BY p.proj_no DESC ) r WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8 UNION SELECT 4 AS c, r.* FROM (SELECT p.proj_no,p.proj_category, p.proj_title, p.proj_goals, proj_start, proj_end, NVL2(b.book_no,1,0) AS bm FROM kk_project p LEFT OUTER JOIN kk_bookmark b ON (p.proj_no=b.book_proj AND b.book_id=#{id}) WHERE p.proj_status=1 AND ( p.proj_goals BETWEEN 75 AND 100) AND SYSDATE < p.proj_end ORDER BY p.proj_end ASC ) r WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8
